attributes.action: Allow Pets in Cabin to enter UK up to 7 kigs as most of European Countries.
attributes.additional_details: As a European citizen I use to travel a lot to Europe but everything is complicated as its not possible to fly back with the pet. So we have to travel by car from London to Charles de Gauche Airport and then drive back to use Eurorunnel or the Ferry. Long trip to do it for a weekend only.
attributes.background: Allow to enter to the United Kingdom by Air and Train to Pets in cabin under 7 kgs as all Europe. After the pandemic more and more people adopted a pet which is also well and its difficult to find someone to look after our pets. So we need to be able to come back by air.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602544
